title: BBC Local Live: Northamptonshire for Friday, 8 April 2016 - BBC News
summary: sonic boom caused by two raf typhoon jets 'shakes ' buildings in northamptonshire .
silverstone racing circuit could be sold to jaguar land rover in a deal thought to be worth £ 33m .
northamptonshire teenager calls for people to have a better understanding of obsessive-compulsive disorder .
league one promotion celebrations in sight for northampton town this weekend .
more news , sport , travel and weather updates from 08:00 on monday .

documents.title: our live coverage through the day
text: local live has finished for today but we 'll be back on monday from 08:00 with all the latest news , weather , sport and travel .
have a good weekend .

documents.title: weather : showers clearing but returning tomorrow
text: scattered showers gradually fading away this evening to leave most places dry for a time with clear intervals with temperatures dipping to 5c ( 41f ) .

saturday will start cloudy with outbreaks of rain , gradually clearing eastwards to leave a mixture of sunny spells and scattered showers for the afternoon with temperatures reaching highs of 11c ( 52f ) .
author: Dan Holley
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: what causes a sonic boom ?
text: two sonic booms were heard across northamptonshire causing loud bangs and plenty of calls to the emergency services , but what is a sonic boom ?
dr jim wild , from lancaster university , explains how and why a sonic boom happens .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: former school becomes dance school two years after closing
text: great houghton school , which closed in 2014 , has been converted into a dance school which is due to open this weekend .
estha jones was a dance teacher at woolaston school and wanted a place to call her own .
it took her six years to find the right place and is currently rehearsing with her first students for the event tomorrow .
author: Micaela Kelly
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: rovers hope to delay cobblers 'party '
text: bristol rovers are aiming to ruin northampton town 's league two promotion party on saturday , says forward matt taylor .
`` we have a gameplan to try to execute a win , '' he told bbc radio bristol .
`` it will be a tough game .
but we 'll be going there to ruin their promotion party . ''
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: saints injuries 'not easy ' says mallinder
text: northampton saints director of rugby jim mallinder says the number of injuries they 've had is `` not easy '' .
the saints face saracens at allianz park on saturday , with is artificial pitch , which mallinder says they enjoy
author: Graham McKechnie
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: jets that caused sonic boom were sent to intercept aircraft
text: a loud bang heard over northamptonshire this afternoon was a sonic boom caused by two jets flying over the county .

in the past few minutes , an raf spokesperson told bbc radio northampton two raf typhoon aircraft jets were scrambled from rafconingsby , in lincolnshire , to intercept a civilian aircraft which was n't responding to radio messages .
the aircraft was escorted safely to cardiff airport .
author: Anna Bartlett
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: on twitter : sonic boom felt across northamptonshire
text: the sonic boom , believed to have been caused by two raf jets according to northants fire and rescue , has been heard at locations across the county including daventry , northampton and silverstone :
@ twitterid bang shook house in rectory farm .
same thing happened almost a year ago to the day !
de ja vu ?
northants fire & rescue say they got confirmation from raf wittering that it was two jets who created a sonic boom .
@ twitterid i heard it in daventry but was not very loud
diiiid anyone else feel the earth move just then ? ?
# thoughtalorryhadbackedintothepaddockbuilding
@ twitterid scared the poop out of everyone in the woodcote grandstand
@ twitterid bet it did !
@ twitterid raf typhoon in a rush heading south westish .
maybe a qra .
@ twitterid was a qra , escorting a jet into cardiff airport that has lost radio comms .
@ twitterid apparently it was a sonic boom from an raf jet !
@ twitterid sonic boom
@ twitterid yep heard it in the village too ( silverstone ) .
@ twitterid we felt it here at turweston
@ twitterid apparently it was an raf tornado .
they are allowed to go supersonic over land if they get operational clearance .
@ twitterid errors yes , heard it in witney oxfordshire
@ twitterid yep house shook south of buckingham and drove dogs wild .
@ twitterid heard it out in duston / kislingbury area too .
@ twitterid massive explosion felt here in gawcott the other side of buckingham no idea what it was .
police have a chopper up looking
@ twitterid it was heard here in mk too ? ? ?
@ twitterid heard a big bang in northampton .
sonic boom ?

documents.title: loud bang heard in northampton with reports buildings shaking caused by 'sonic boom ' from jets
text: a loud bang has been heard in various parts of northampton - including brickmills , kingsthorpe , and brixworth .
some people have also reported that doors and windows shock from the bang .
northants fire and rescue tell us they got confirmation from raf wittering that it was two jets which created a sonic boom .
they say they have been inundated with calls .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: northampton school is building playground on its roof
text: a school in northampton is giving `` play time '' a high rise twist by building a playground on its roof .
abington vale primary school is building on the roof of stirling campus .
the building is a converted office block and one of several school developments of non-school buildings in the town .
i 've been to take a look
author: Tom Percival
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: mother and child left shaken '' after car nearly hits them on zebra crossing in northampton
text: a mother was forced to pull her young child out of the way of a car that failed to stop at a zebra crossing .
author: Northampton Chronicle & Echo

documents.title: man dies after being hit by a lorry in daventry
text: a pedestrian has died in a collision in daventry this morning that involved a heavy goods vehicle .
the man died at the scene of the incident which happened at about 09.30 in ashby road , near to langdon close .
investigations into how the collision occurred are taking place in conjunction with the health and safety executive , police said .
ashby road , near the junction of langdon close , remains closed and motorists are advised to take alternative routes .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: a6 closed both ways in desborough
text: the a6 is closed in both directions between the braybrooke road junction and the a6 harborough road junction because of accident involving two cars .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: weather : bright spells but showers coming
text: there are some bright spells around today .
here 's bozeat captured by bbc weather watcher `` up to snow good '' .
however , a few showers are likely to develop through the afternoon with a high of 12c ( 54f ) .
there are more details on the bbc weather website .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: music festival organised by bob harris at silverstone cancelled
text: a country music festival planned for silverstone has been cancelled .
the under the apple tree festival was due to have taken place during the bank holiday weekend at the end of may .
the broadcaster , bob harris - who was behind the festival - says that ticket sales had not kept up with costs and he 's had to cancel it `` with a heavy heart '' .
author: John Griff
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: drivers warned over road closure in northamptonshire village that could impact on a508 traffic
text: motorists are being warned of a road closure in spratton next week .
author: Daventry Express

documents.title: council wants greyfriars to be 'the right thing for northampton '
text: the leader of northampton borough council says they `` want to take more time to consider the future of the greyfriars site and want to get it right '' , after they delayed the release of proposals for the former bus station site which was demolished more than a year ago .
mary markham said : `` the decision we take now will shape that part of northampton for many years to come and what happens there has to be the right thing for northampton . ''
author: Sam Read
BBC Radio Northampton politics reporter

documents.title: dental records confirm identity of body pulled from nene is that of missing oundle man
text: the family of a man who went missing from oundle have confirmed a body found in a river was him .
author: Northamptonshire Telegraph

documents.title: headlines : body found in hedge identified delays to greyfriars development
text: here are your lunchtime headlines :
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northamptonshire hit by trio of injuries ahead of new season
text: the new cricket season came firmly into focus this morning with the pre-season press gathering at wantage road .
northamptonshire head coach david ripley was naturally in good spirits ahead of their season-opener against sussex on sunday .
but his side have received a blow with steven crook , rob keogh and rob newton all ruled out through injury - bad news for an already skinny squad .
author: Alex Winter
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: silverstone circuit looking for sale get to cash injection to cover cost of british grand prix
text: yesterday at an emergency general meeting members of the british racing drivers club ( brdc ) narrowly voted in favour of the continuing exclusive discussions talk to jaguar land rover about buying the circuit .
the brdc have been looking for investment and to potentially sell the circuit for a few years
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: all change for the saints ahead of the championship cup quarter-final
text: northampton saints have made five changes :
tick tock , team o'clock !
five changes for saints ahead of @ twitterid qf .
@ twitterid skippers at saracens
@ twitterid @ twitterid not you 're strongest team resting players for the premiership are we # givingupalready
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid # congrats on the start @ twitterid the # saintsnation will be cheering all the way
@ twitterid @ twitterid heading to allianz to support @ twitterid tomorrow # ciarraiabu
@ twitterid @ twitterid jesus christ , ben nutley was playing for moseley a month ago
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid considering injuries this is a pretty decent team # seizetheday lads # believe & youwillachieve # coys

@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid do us proud tomorrow and win .
would make it sweet as wife is a @ twitterid fan
@ twitterid @ twitterid

documents.title: old greyfriars bus station site in northampton proposals delayed
text: northampton borough council have said that proposals from developers for the greyfriars site for development will not be put on display next week as originally planned .
the council say they now `` hope '' to put proposals on display during the summer and make a final decision in the early autumn .
author: Sam Read
BBC Radio Northampton politics reporter

documents.title: take away our free parking permits , say two kettering councillors
text: two kettering councillors are proposing a motion which would see all members lose their right to free parking in the town .
author: Northamptonshire Telegraph

documents.title: obsessive-compulsive disorder is 'all cleaning ' says 17-year-old sufferer
text: oliver wilson from apethorpe , near oundle , is 17 and lives with obsessive-compulsive disorder ( ocd ) - a mental health condition where a person has obsessive thoughts and compulsive activity .
he 's one of 740,000 people in the uk who have the condition - and says there needs to be better understanding of ocd .
he told me people think the condition is `` all kim and aggie ''
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: jaguar land rover 'exploring options ' with potential silverstone purchase
text: a spokesman for jaguar land rover has told us that they are `` exploring potential options at silverstone with the brdc , but it is too soon to share details at this stage '' .
yesterday the brdc members voted to continue exclusive discussions with jaguar land rover over a £ 33m sale of the circuit .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: chief constable to meet ppc candidates today
text: today the three candidates to be the next police and crime commissioner for the county will meet the chief constable
nominations for the election next month closed yesterday .
kevin mckeever will stand for labour , stephen mold for the conservatives and sam watts for ukip .
current commissioner adam simmonds is not standing .
i 'm briefing pcc candidates on @ twitterid this morning .
i will say that our purpose is to protect people from harm .
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid candidates following destructive , divisive , feminist ideology unsuitable wo n't protect all
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: high court help request for northamptonshire victims of domestic violence
text: a six-month backlog in northamptonshire 's court service means that domestic violence victims are not getting justice , it has been claimed .
author: Northamptonshire Telegraph

documents.title: silverstone could be sold to jaguar land rover for £ 33m
text: members of the british racing drivers club ( brdc ) have voted in favour of continuing to discuss silverstone circuit with jaguar land rover .
the deal , discussed at an emergency meeting yesterday , is thought to offer the prospect of a £ 33m injection in return for a 249-year lease on the circuit .
the brdc will still own the company which runs the british grand prix and pay the cost of hosting the event which costs about £ 18m a year .
author: Martin Heath
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: wilder says cobblers have a 'great opportunity ' of securing promotion tomorrow
text: northampton town manager chris wilder is expecting sixfields to be `` rocking '' for tomorrow afternoon 's visit of bristol rovers .
promotion will be secured from league two if the cobblers win - but they 're up against a team in a great run of form , with eight wins in their last 10 games .
wilder told me that it 's `` all to play for '' but they have a `` fantastic opportunity to get out of this division '' .
author: Graham McKechnie
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: mystery donor promises to match every pound donated to northants air ambulance
text: an anonymous donor has pledged to double every pound that is donated to northants air ambulance - sparking a new fundraising campaign .
author: Northants Herald & Post

documents.title: police formally indientify body found in january on northampton roadside
text: police have confirmed that the body found in bushes on billing brook road , northampton , in january is 32-year-old adeyemi olugbuyi .
he was last seen in the area in september 2013 .

a murder inquiry was launched following the discovery of the body on tuesday , 26 january 2016.two men , aged 43 and 29 , from northampton , were arrested in february on sus of murder and released on bail pending further inquiries .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : bright morning but afternoon showers
text: it 'll be a bright morning but a few showers are likely to develop through the afternoon with a high of 12c ( 54f ) .
there are more local details on the bbc weather website .
author: Georgina Burnett
BBC Weather

documents.title: headlines : silverstone could be sold better understanding of ocd needed
text: here are our headlines :
author: Simon Watts
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: a45 westbound one lane blocked near earls barton
text: the a45 westbound has one lane blocked between the grendon junction and the great billing interchange because of an accident involving two cars .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: good morning and welcome to local live for northamptonshire
text: between now and 18:00 we 'll be bringing you the day 's news , latest travel , a look ahead to the weekend 's sport and friday 's weather forecast .
if you want to get in touch then please email me , tweet us or head to facebook .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live
